Description: We are hiring a Land Surveyor for one of our clients in Doha.Candidates who have the required qualifications and good experience may apply.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree and/or diploma in Civil Engineering from an accredited university to the approval of the Engineer.
Minimum 12 years of demonstrable overall experience with a minimum of 5 years in all aspects of setting out and surveying similar construction projects.
Prior experience with consultancy is a must.
Must have worked on Ashghal projects.
With a car and a valid driving license.
With a valid visa and QID
Residing in Qatar
